data.message:
This cant be your last album Em imagine the outcome 
every fan looks up to you like a god youll never be out done.

Aftermath would be ruined and rap would be gone. The whole scene would just collapse into none.

And all these people that say they can rap are just faggots, lil wayne, kanye, jay z, maggots as long as there around rap would be consistently shit, freestyles with just one word dick.... Dick.... DICK.

So dont leave us yet as the world isnt over, rap without eminem is like an army without soldiers.
